alert.note: Alert for Butte; Harding (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 06 at 5:54AM MDT until October 06 at 8:00AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MDT THIS MORNING... ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the first Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 29. For the second Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28 expected. * WHERE...In South Dakota, Harding County and Butte County. In Wyoming, Western Crook County and Northeastern Crook County. * WHEN...For the first Freeze Warning, until 8 AM MDT this morning. For the second Freeze Warning, from 11 PM this evening to 8 AM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Locations that do not see temperatures below freezing this morning will likely fall below freezing for several hours on Saturday morning.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
